div:
This is a frontend application as a basic framework, written in Javascript ES6 and pretended to emulate multiple pages by controlling them through one file.
This applicacion runs only with HTML and JS, so if it needs, html extension can be changed by PHP, PY or ASP.
This project includes Sass files with pre-builded elements styles.
DCC JS files stands for Dynamic Content Controller.

dd.p:
I develop this application just to put into practice what I am learning from the use of native Javascript ES6 and Sass for CSS. This motivation comes from the fact of deepening how framworks or libraries work and in parallel solve in a simple and light way similar functions.
To be honest: I love to resolve easily and quickly to deploy into production any app, so I like pre-builded apps ;)

This Font End app is intended to be usefull for any Back End driver or software, such as PHP, Python, .NET or NodeJS.
Just changing the files extensions can be deploy in Apache, NodeJS or Nginx servers.
With and RESTfull API behind, it can be used to connect to local or remote databases.
Remember to use Rewrite Rules to redirect all possible urls to main application file.
Although this application is for testing, I hope it will be useful for future development and production, keeping the code updated by collaborating with the developer community.
